cu.explanation_en: Setting tracking_area_code to 0 is invalid as it is a reserved value, causing configuration validation failure and preventing proper cell setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting pMax to 100 exceeds the maximum allowed power level, causing configuration validation failure and preventing proper uplink power control.
du.explanation_zh: 將 pMax 設定為 100 超過最大允許功率水平，會導致配置驗證失敗，並阻止正確的上行鏈路功率控制。
